title: Neo Sophia
subtitle: Educational App Design
description: UI/UX design for an AI-driven educational platform that makes philosophy and wisdom traditions accessible to modern learners through engaging character interactions.
situation: Neo Sophia had developed groundbreaking AI technology for philosophical education but lacked the visual storytelling to match their innovative approach. Their brand presence needed a compelling way to communicate the warmth and wisdom of their content to potential users and investors.
task: Create a visual narrative that feels both intellectually rigorous and emotionally inviting. The content needed to make ancient wisdom feel relevant to digital-native audiences while maintaining the gravitas these traditions deserve.

action.title: Character-Driven Storytelling
action.content: We centered the commercial around Sophie Fox and Mr. Brain—mascot characters that serve as guides through the philosophical curriculum. These characters bridge the gap between complex concepts and accessible learning in a memorable, shareable format.
action.marginalia: Sophie Fox represents curiosity and intuition; Mr. Brain embodies analytical thinking.

action.title: Narrative Structure
action.content: The commercial mirrors the journey of philosophical inquiry: from wonder to investigation to understanding. Each scene was designed to communicate core value propositions while encouraging viewers to explore further.
action.marginalia: Custom 2D animation blends classical philosophy references with contemporary digital aesthetics.

action.title: Visual Language of Wisdom
action.content: We developed a warm, inviting color palette paired with clean motion design that suggests both approachability and intellectual depth. Fluid animations showcase the platform's personality and educational philosophy.
action.marginalia: Custom illustrations blend classical philosophy references with contemporary digital aesthetics.

result: The redesigned app saw a 60% increase in daily active users and a 45% improvement in lesson completion rates. User feedback specifically praised the welcoming aesthetic and intuitive navigation. Neo Sophia has since secured additional funding to expand their curriculum.
